00033 // Web colour is currently unsupported
00034 #define wxPG_COLOUR_WEB_BASE        0x10000
00035 //#define wxPG_TO_WEB_COLOUR(A)   ((wxUint32)(A+wxPG_COLOUR_WEB_BASE))
00036 
00037 #define wxPG_COLOUR_CUSTOM      0xFFFFFF
00038 
00046 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxColourPropertyValue : public wxObject
00047 {
00048 public:
00066     wxUint32    m_type;
00067 
00069     wxColour    m_colour;
00070 
00071     wxColourPropertyValue () { }
00072 
00073     inline wxColourPropertyValue ( const wxColour& colour )
00074     {
00075         m_type = wxPG_COLOUR_CUSTOM;
00076         m_colour = colour;
00077     }
00078 
00079     inline wxColourPropertyValue ( wxUint32 type )
00080     {
00081         m_type = type;
00082     }
00083 
00084     inline wxColourPropertyValue ( wxUint32 type, const wxColour& colour )
00085     {
00086         m_type = type;
00087         m_colour = colour;
00088     }
00089 
00090 private:
00091     DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxColourPropertyValue)
00092 };
00093 
00094 bool WXDLLIMPEXP_PG operator == (const wxColourPropertyValue&, const wxColourPropertyValue&);
00095 
00096 WX_PG_DECLARE_VALUE_TYPE_WITH_DECL(wxColourPropertyValue,WXDLLIMPEXP_PG)

00101 #define WX_PG_DECLARE_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_WITH_DECL(NAME,DECL) \
00102 extern DECL wxPGProperty* wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)( const wxString&, const wxString& = wxPG_LABEL, const wxColourPropertyValue& = *((wxColourPropertyValue*)NULL) );
00103 
00104 #define WX_PG_DECLARE_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY(NAME) \
00105 extern wxPGProperty* wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)( const wxString&, const wxString& = wxPG_LABEL, const wxColourPropertyValue& = *((wxColourPropertyValue*)NULL) );
00106 
00107 #define WX_PG_DECLARE_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR_WITH_DECL(NAME,DECL) \
00108 extern DECL wxPGProperty* wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)( const wxString&, const wxString& = wxPG_LABEL, const wxColour& = *wxBLACK );
00109 
00110 #define WX_PG_DECLARE_CUSTOM_COLOUR_PROPERTY_USES_WXCOLOUR(NAME) \
00111 extern wxPGProperty* wxPG_CONSTFUNC(NAME)( const wxString&, const wxString& = wxPG_LABEL, const wxColour& = *wxBLACK );

00164 class WXDLLIMPEXP_PG wxSystemColourPropertyClass : public wxEnumPropertyClass
00165 {
00166     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS()
00167 public:
00168 
00169     wxSystemColourPropertyClass ( const wxString& label, const wxString& name,
00170         const wxColourPropertyValue& value );
00171     ~wxSystemColourPropertyClass ();
00172 
00173     WX_PG_DECLARE_BASIC_TYPE_METHODS()
00174     WX_PG_DECLARE_EVENT_METHODS()
00175     WX_PG_DECLARE_CUSTOM_PAINT_METHODS()
00176 
00177     // Default is to use wxSystemSettings::GetColour(index). Override to use
00178     // custom colour tables etc.
00179     virtual long GetColour ( int index );
00180 
00181 protected:
00182 
00183     // Special constructors to be used by derived classes.
00184     wxSystemColourPropertyClass( const wxString& label, const wxString& name,
00185         const wxChar** labels, const long* values, unsigned int itemcount,
00186         const wxColourPropertyValue& value );
00187     wxSystemColourPropertyClass( const wxString& label, const wxString& name,
00188         const wxChar** labels, const long* values, unsigned int itemcount,
00189         const wxColour& value );
00190 
00191     void Init ( int type, const wxColour& colour );
00192 
00193     // Translates colour to a int value, return wxNOT_FOUND if no match.
00194     int ColToInd ( const wxColour& colour );
00195 
00196     wxColourPropertyValue   m_value;
00197 };

00239 class wxMultiChoicePropertyClass : public wxPGProperty
00240 {
00241     WX_PG_DECLARE_PROPERTY_CLASS()
00242 public:
00243

00245                                const wxString& name,

00249         const wxArrayInt& value = wxArrayInt() );

00251 
00252     virtual void DoSetValue ( wxPGVariant value );
00253     virtual wxPGVariant DoGetValue () const;
00254     virtual wxString GetValueAsString ( int flags = 0 ) const;
00255     virtual bool SetValueFromString ( const wxString& text, int flags );
00256     WX_PG_DECLARE_EVENT_METHODS()
00257

00259 
00260 protected:
00261 
00262     void GenerateValueAsString ();
